      void setIsolation()

      void update()
      Update status daily If you are healthy , you will stay healthy If you are INFLECTION and the T large 3 ,you will be detected and isolation If you are in hospital, and the length of hospital stay spans more than 8 days,you will setHeath but you have 0.95's rate dead if you have dead,the time will be static

      • update

        public void update()
        Update status daily If you are healthy , you will stay healthy If you are INFLECTION and the T large 3 ,you will be detected and isolation If you are in hospital, and the length of hospital stay spans more than 8 days,you will setHeath but you have 0.95's rate dead if you have dead,the time will be static

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g,
                 int x,
                 int y,
                 int size)
        draw a little cell
        参数:
        g - little Graphics
        x - x_position
        y - y_position
        size - size The different statuses have different color HTALTH --- GREEN INFLECTION --- RED ISOLATION --- ORANGE DEATH --- BLACK
